title: Near-zero environmental impact aircraft
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4772-4782
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00419A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Prakash Prashanth, Jad Elmourad, Carla Grobler, Stewart Isaacs, Syed Shayan Zahid, James Abel, Christoph Falter, Thibaud Fritz, Florian Allroggen, Jayant S. Sabnis, Sebastian D. Eastham, Raymond L. Speth, Steven R. H. Barrett
The fundamental challenge facing the aviation industry is to achieve near-zero environmental impacts while sustaining growth. We propose a near-zero impact aircraft, taking a lifecycle perspective across fuels, aircraft design, and operation.
